name: Pebblematic
body:
### Pebblematic - BETA
This is a small Pebble app i am working on. It is designed to have the most needed features of my pimatic setup on my wrist. 

Still in early beta, i want to share this. Pull-Request are always great! 

### Howto
First you need to setup the App. In your Pebble App on your smartphone go to the settings of Pebblematic. Enter your api-url and save. 

### Videos
See https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8bsQUnFMganRNYb5m2Z3W2U5Qugzz21i for more.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
